Entries.Jordan: Wow, for me? Thanks, dude!$h/-75 -7/Oh, thank you so much!$h/-79 -80 -81 -27 -6 -5 -4/Uh...//Not cool, dude.../-20/Oh, thanks!$h/-26 -12 -2

Entries.Jordan0: I can't believe I'm getting married! I love you so much.$3
Entries.Jordan1: I hope everything will go well tomorrow.$3

Entries.1329361/F: 50s/17 24/farmer 17 24 2 Jordan 26 23 2/skippable/move farmer 5 0 1/faceDirection Jordan 3/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/emote Jordan 32/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/move farmer 4 0 0 true/faceDirection Jordan 2/pause 500/speak Jordan "Howdy, @!$1#$b#How are you?$1"/pause 500/message "What's up with this new room?"/pause 500/speak Jordan "Right! We've had some changes...$3#$b#I had Victor and Kyle help me clean up this locked room.$1#$b#And now guess what..!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Jordan "I have my own store!$1#$b#Heard some complains that Pierre's stock doesn't offer some seasonal seeds...$3#$b#So I decided to open up my own little shop, with plenty of more seeds to offer!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Jordan "Oh, of course I spoke to Pierre about it... Wouldn't want to get on anyone's bad side...$3#$b#He said he didn't mind, since his store also offers other things that bring in customers, not just seeds.$3#$b#So everyone seems okay with this...$3"/pause 500/emote Jordan 32/pause 500/speak Jordan "Either way! Like I mentioned before, I sell seasonal seeds over here.$3#$b#Everything's the same price, and in winter I will sell tree saplings.$3#$b#You're always welcome to use my store if you can't find the seeds you need at Pierre's...$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak Jordan "It's normally open from 10AM to 6PM. But you can use it anytime!$3#$b#Just take whatever you need and leave the money on the counter.$3"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jordan "I'll see you around!"/pause 1000/end

Didn't expect for you to visit today.$1"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Eden "Hello..."/textAboveHead Kenny "HI!! HI!! It's very integrating.#$b#We love cleaning together!$1"/textAboveHead Jordan "Right, guys?"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Eden "It's okay..."/textAboveHead Aubrey "Ugh."/pause 500/textAboveHead Kenny "Yeeees!!!"/emote Kyle 40/emote RM.Victor 12/pause 2000/emote Jordan 28/pause 500/speak Jordan "Well. At least it brings everyone together."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Jordan "You'd like to help?#$b#Oh, no, we wouldn't make you clean for us...$3#$b#You're always free to hang around, though!$1"/pause 500/emote Jordan 32/end
Entries.3466021/F/f Jordan 1500: none/7 25/farmer 7 27 0 Jordan 4 26 1 RM.Victor 4 24 2 Aubrey 5 24 2 Kenny 6 24 2 Eden 7 25 3 Kyle 7 26 3/skippable/animate Jordan false true 500 18 18 18/animate RM.Victor false true 500 18 18 18/animate Aubrey false true 500 23 23 23/animate Kenny false true 500 19 19 19/animate Eden false true 500 24 24 24/animate Kyle false true 500 36 36 36/emote Jordan 32/emote Aubrey 8/textAboveHead Kenny "My turn!"/move farmer -1 0 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Jordan "Oh! Hello, @. We didn't expect you today...$3"/pause 500/textAboveHead Aubrey "Welcome, hun!"/textAboveHead Kenny "You!!!"/textAboveHead Eden "Hi!"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Jordan "Oh, we're playing this 'What am I?' guessing game.$3#$b#Want to join in?$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/move farmer -1 0 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jordan "Here."/pause 500/message "You put on the headband before Jordan hands you a mystery card."/pause 500/speak Jordan "Don't peek, okay?$3#$b#Alright, we can continue... Kenny, it was your turn?$3"/speak Kenny "Yes!#$b#Um... Am I edible?"/pause 500/textAboveHead Kyle "Depends on the country..."/pause 500/emote Jordan 28/textAboveHead Aubrey "Oh my god, Kyle..."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/emote Eden 12/pause 500/speak Kenny "What's that supposed to mean..?$2"/pause 500/speak Eden "Don't think about it too much... Maybe your next question will give you more clarity.$1#$b#Anyway, my turn...$1#$b#Hmm... Am I an animal?$1"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jordan "No!"/textAboveHead Aubrey "Nuh-uh!"/pause 200/textAboveHead Kenny "Yes!!!"/pause 500/speak Eden "Hmm, okay.#$b#Kyle, your turn.$1"/speak Kyle "Am I in this room?"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jordan "Yup!"/textAboveHead Aubrey "Yeah..."/pause 200/textAboveHead Kenny "Duh!!!"/pause 500/speak Kyle "Cool. So I'm an object?$1"/pause 500/textAboveHead Aubrey "No more questions, Kyle!"/pause 700/emote Kyle 32/pause 500/speak Kyle "Anyway. Your turn, @."/pause 200/message "Am I an object..?"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jordan "Nope!"/textAboveHead Aubrey "No."/textAboveHead Kenny "Yes!!!"/textAboveHead Eden "Nope!"/textAboveHead Kyle "Depends..."/pause 500/speak Jordan "Alright, my turn... Am I a vegetable?$3"/pause 500/textAboveHead Aubrey "No!"/textAboveHead Eden "Nope!"/emote Kyle 36/pause 500/speak Jordan "Hm... Okay then. Victor, your turn."/pause 500/speak RM.Victor "Am I an apple?"/pause 500/textAboveHead Eden "You peeked again!!"/textAboveHead Aubrey "Victor..."/pause 200/textAboveHead Kyle "I can't believe this."/textAboveHead Kenny "YES, WOOHOO!!!"/emote Jordan 28/pause 1000/emote RM.Victor 32/end
Entries.9056961/F/f Jordan 2000: none/25 25/farmer 17 24 1 Jordan 26 23 2 Aubrey 28 24 3 Eden 26 26 0 Kenny 25 26 0/skippable/shake Jordan 700/emote Jordan 12/move farmer 5 0 1 true/speak Jordan "Guys, it's not as easy as you think..."/pause 500/speak Eden "Why? We would share some duties..."/pause 500/textAboveHead Aubrey "Hello, hun!"/pause 500/faceDirection Jordan 3/faceDirection Eden 3/faceDirection Kenny 3/pause 500/textAboveHead Kenny "HI!!!"/pause 500/faceDirection Jordan 2/faceDirection Eden 0/faceDirection Kenny 0/speak Jordan "See? I have a customer, let's finish this topic later."/pause 500/speak Aubrey "You've been stalling the topic for days..."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Aubrey "Actually, how about we ask @? Maybe they can help out."/pause 500/textAboveHead Eden "Yeah."/textAboveHead Kenny "Yes!!"/faceDirection Eden 3/faceDirection Kenny 3/pause 500/speak Jordan "No, let's not burden @ with our bussiness...$2"/faceDirection Jordan 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Eden "We're trying to convince Jordan to sell our goods at the store.$1#$b#Aubrey's clothes and my paintings.$1"/pause 500/textAboveHead Kenny "And my rocks!!"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jordan 2/faceDirection Eden 0/faceDirection Kenny 0/speak Jordan "This isn't a good idea, guys. And don't involve @ into this.#$b#There needs to be a certain amount of demand for the sold product to be profitable..."/pause 500/speak Aubrey "Oh, so you think our work isn't good enough?$4"/speak Jordan "No... Please, don't be dramatic. That's not what I'm trying to say."/pause 500/shake Aubrey 500/textAboveHead Aubrey "DRAMATIC???"/pause 500/emote Jordan 28/faceDirection Eden 2/faceDirection Kenny 3/speak Kenny "I think we need your help in communicating, @."/pause 500/faceDirection Jordan 3/emote farmer 28/speak Jordan "No, it's really okay... Give me five minutes, @. You can wait in the living room..."/pause 500/message "There could be demand... I can ask around."/pause 500/faceDirection Kenny 3/faceDirection Eden 3/faceDirection Jordan 3/pause 500/emote Aubrey 20/emote Eden 32/emote Kenny 32/pause 500/speak Kenny "Yes! I think so too!"/speak Aubrey "I can go ask around with you.#$b#We can take some examples from my room. No one will resist those creations!$1"/pause 500/speak Jordan "Well... If you guys can make that happen. I guess we will re-consider it once more.$3#$b#Thanks for your help, @.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/end

Entries.2894551/F/f Jordan 1750/w sunny: breezy/14 7/farmer 19 12 0 Jordan 12 7 3/skippable/animate Jordan false true 500 16 16 16 17 17 16 16 16/emote Jordan 28/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer -2 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -3 0 3/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Jordan "Oh, hello, @...$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Jordan "How am I? Oh... Why?$3#$b#I'm okay. Been better, but...#$b#I'm fine.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Jordan "I mean, I've just been having... Thoughts... Recently.#$b#Nothing too scary. Just... A lot of things lack purpose to me."/pause 500/message "I'm here to listen."/pause 500/emote Jordan 12/pause 500/speak Jordan "Um... Sorry. Let's not talk about me...$3#$b#How are things with you? Any fun stories from your farm recently?$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/end

Entries.1463321/F/w sunny/f Jordan 2500: breezy/42 23/Jordan 43 23 2 farmer 42 16 2/skippable/move farmer 0 7 2/emote Jordan 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Jordan "Hi...$3"/pause 2000/message "Something on your mind?"/pause 500/speak Jordan "Oh, you know... Thinking about this and that...$3"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection Jordan 3/pause 500/speak Jordan "I could tell you, but... Are you sure you want to be burdened by what I'm about to say?"/pause 500/message "You can tell me anything."/speak Jordan "Okay...$3#$b#I'll tell you.$3"/pause 500/shake Jordan 500/emote Jordan 28/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Jordan "So... There's this person that can't leave my mind recently...#$b#Um. Basically, I think I developed a crush.$3#$b#...The whole situation is making me very uncomfortable.#$b#I don't want to confess, I'm scared they're too good for me."/pause 500/emote Jordan 28/pause 500/speak Jordan "I just think they would be better off with someone else.#$b#So I'm trying to fight off my feelings for them."/pause 1000/faceDirection Jordan 2/pause 500/speak Jordan "I don't mind getting rejected, it's just...#$b#It's hard to fight the feelings without an answer."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 40/end
